臲字的基本解释

臲
niè
〔臲卼（
w?）〕不安。

臲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》五結切，入屑，疑。］
“甈2”的被通假字。
见“臲卼”。

臲字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【自字部】　臲； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1000第32
【廣韻】五結切【正韻】魚列切，?音齧。【廣韻】臲卼，不安。【易·困卦】上六，困于葛藟于臲硊。【疏】臲卼，動搖不安之貌。【書·秦誓】作杌隉。【韓愈·贈劉思服詩】作兀臲。一本作??。亦作兀臬。隉字原从木作。

臲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
臲字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
tottering
niè
〔臲卼(
w?)] Uneasy.
tottering
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" five knots cut, into chips, doubt. ]
The false word for "Nuo 2".
See "Zang Si".
tottering
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [From the Department of Words] 　臲; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1000 32
[Guang Yun] Five knots cut [Zheng Yun] Fish row cut, sound bite. [Guang Yun] Jian Bian, uneasy. [Easy·Kunky Gua] On the sixth stage, I am stuck in Ge Xing Yu Xian. 【Sparse】Zang Bian, shakes up his uneasy appearance. 【Book·Qin Oath】It's made for Xiaohao. [Han Yu·Gifts Liu Sifu Poems] as Wu Zang. One book. Also used as a blindfold. The word 陧 was originally made from wood.
